messages.title: Standing up for the NHS
messages.content: We know we need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give it the funds that it needs.

messages.title: Opposing School Cuts
messages.content: Local schools are under serious threat from a Conservative Government. Schools in Northamptonshire are set to lose more than £40 million from their budgets.

messages.title: People to decide on BREXIT
messages.content: Theresa May is planning a hard BREXIT which will threaten the economy and jobs. Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to give the final say to the British people not the politicians.

messages.title: A Greener, enterprise economy
messages.content: We would kickstart our economy by pushing for proper lifelong learning, more apprenticeships, more support for small businesses & a return of subsidies for going green, supporting green jobs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Additional investment in health and care services.
Oppose cuts to local school budgets, protect schools from losing £40 million.
Fight against a hard Brexit, allowing the final say to be with the British people.
Push for lifelong learning, apprenticeships, and support for small businesses. Return of subsidies for going green and supporting green jobs.

issues.economy: We would kickstart our economy by pushing for proper lifelong learning, more apprenticeships, more support for small businesses & a return of subsidies for going green, supporting green jobs.
issues.education: Schools in Northamptonshire are set to lose more than £40 million from their budgets.
issues.environment: Return of subsidies for going green, supporting green jobs.
issues.health: Additional investment in health and care services.
